scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && poetry run ruff check src tests
scripts.loadtest:backend: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/loadtest.py --base-url http://localhost:3301 --requests 400 --concurrency 20 --target-success-rate 0.98 --target-p95-ms 1000
scripts.loadtest:backend:trend: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/loadtest.py --base-url http://localhost:3301 --requests 600 --concurrency 30 --history-out ../artifacts/loadtest-history.jsonl --trend-out ../artifacts/loadtest-trend.md --history-window 30 --target-success-rate 0.98 --target-p95-ms 1000
